pageContext.claim: “I watched Biden in the previous debates and he was horrible. And I watched him in the Bernie debate and he was normal. He wasn't Winston Churchill but he was normal. It was sort of like an even deal. He got by it. And I said that was a different guy than the guy that was in the debates where Kamala just took him apart.”
pageContext.analysis: On the basis of no evidence, Trump suggests Biden is taking performance-enhancing drugs.
